synopsis.text:
Will the Earth face its ultimate destruction, or will it be saved by a group of valiant warriors? The former Sun God, Abel, has returned with a divine mission to cleanse the Earth of humanity and establish a new world for the Gods. To achieve this, he seeks the help of his sister, Athena, and a formidable force of resurrected Gold Saints and his own divine warriors.

When Athena refuses to comply with Abel's plans, she is cast into the depths of hell. But hope is not lost, as a group of courageous Bronze Saints embarks on a perilous journey to save Athena and protect the Earth. Can these brave warriors triumph against Abel's powerful forces and prevent the Earth's annihilation? Prepare for an epic battle in this thrilling anime that explores the bonds of loyalty, courage, and the fight for humanity's survival.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
